author: kenney
msg: Fix possible ClassCasts for BuildCommands; used portions of patch from MECLIPSE-139 submitted by Jochen Kuhnle

author: cschoett
msg: Fix for BEEHIVE-1152, updated ControlBean velocity template to fix compilation error.  Also added new drt test for this case.

author: pmcmahan
msg: GERONIMO-2553 database pools portlet references non-existent version of tranql.  merging fix from rev 412804 plus adding logic to look up the tranql version number if its not specified in the DatabaseDrivers RAR info

author: gsim
msg: Modified TransactionalStore to return the txn ctxt as an auto_ptr to make ownership more obvious.
